name: Telepathic Turtles
description:
Telepathic Turtles!

Made for the GMTK game jam with the theme: "Joined Together"

Features: 

  • 25 Interesting and unique levels
  • An original soundtrack
  • Turtles!

Controls (explained in game also): WASD / Arrow Keys

Engine: Godot

Graphics: Aseprite

Music: Beepbox

Please give constructive feedback if you have any suggestions.

You may be asking: why turtles? 

Well, I'm just a turtle person.

Also there is a super annoying bug that I couldn't fix on time where sometimes when you load in a level, the characters are positioned the wrong way.
